headline: Fresh California Salsa
name: Fresh California Salsa
description: This spicy salsa recipe is made with chopped tomatoes, jalapeños, onion, garlic, cilantro, and lime. Simply season to taste and it's ready to serve!

recipeInstructions.text: In a small mixing bowl, combine tomatoes, onion, garlic, cilantro, and lime juice. Add 2 teaspoons minced jalapeños; taste to see how hot it is, then add more if desired. Season with salt to taste. Enjoy!
